plot: When legendary TV telethon host Joseph Ludgren Jr. hits the skids, his colleagues rally to his aid; but, it takes a tragedy to get him back on the air.
title: Lofty
plot_es: When legendary TV telethon host Joseph Ludgren Jr. hits the skids, his colleagues rally to his aid; but, it takes a tragedy to get him back on the air.
plot_en: When legendary TV telethon host Joseph Ludgren Jr. hits the skids, his colleagues rally to his aid; but, it takes a tragedy to get him back on the air.
